MCQuestion.q: Using the declaration below, what will be the final element of the array? int [ ] grades = new int[35]?
MCQuestion.messageIfIncorrect: Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is Grades[34]

MCQuestion.q: It is the Java keyword that creates inheritance?
MCQuestion.messageIfIncorrect: Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is Extends

MCQuestion.q: It is the rules of a programming language?
MCQuestion.messageIfIncorrect: Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is Syntax.

MCQuestion.q: It is the code/s inside a pair of curly braces?
MCQuestion.messageIfIncorrect: Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is Block

MCQuestion.q: If A=10, then after B=++A, the value of B is _______
MCQuestion.messageIfIncorrect: Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is 11

MCQuestion.q: It is the characteristics of Java which ensures that a program can go only where it is designed to go and eliminates the possibility of altering system data unintentionally?
MCQuestion.messageIfIncorrect: Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is Java is secure

MCQuestion.q: It is a form of Java program that runs locally on the command line A?
MCQuestion.messageIfIncorrect: Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is Application

MCQuestion.q: It defines the common variables and methods of a set of objects?
MCQuestion.messageIfIncorrect: Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is Class

MCQuestion.q: It is the process of removing errors found in the program?
MCQuestion.messageIfIncorrect: Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is Debugging

MCQuestion.q: Which symbol is used to denote a multi-line comment?
MCQuestion.messageIfIncorrect: Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is /* */

MCQuestion.messageIfIncorrect: Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is Assignment

MCQuestion.q: Which of the following is not a Java keyword?
MCQuestion.messageIfIncorrect: Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is Of

MCQuestion.q: Which of the following is an invalid first character of an identifier?
MCQuestion.messageIfIncorrect: Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is 8

MCQuestion.messageIfIncorrect: Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is 16 bits

TFQuestion.messageIfIncorrect: Sorry, that is incorrect! The correct answer is True.
